name: TimeTest
description: Unit tests for time-related functionalities in the BaseFaker class.

test_cases.name: testFutureTime
test_cases.description: Tests the future time generation functionality ensuring the generated time is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testFutureTimeWithMinimum
test_cases.description: Tests the future time generation functionality with a minimum time ensuring the generated time is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testPastTimeWithMinimum
test_cases.description: Tests the past time generation functionality with a minimum time ensuring the generated time is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testPastTime
test_cases.description: Tests the past time generation functionality ensuring the generated time is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testBetween
test_cases.description: Tests the time generation between two LocalTime instances ensuring the generated time is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithSameLocalTime
test_cases.description: Tests the time generation between two identical LocalTime instances ensuring the generated time is the same.

test_cases.name: testBetweenThenLargerThanNow
test_cases.description: Tests the time generation between two LocalTime instances where the upper bound is less than the lower bound, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the time generation between two LocalTime instances with a specified pattern ensuring the generated time is within the specified range and matches the pattern.

test_cases.name: futureWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the future time generation functionality with a specified pattern ensuring the generated time is parsable with the specified pattern.

test_cases.name: pastWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the past time generation functionality with a specified pattern ensuring the generated time is parsable with the specified pattern.
